Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #97 Skokie bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Delays; Normal boarding at Howard
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains have resumed normal boarding at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains have resumed normal boarding at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Kenneth
ShortDescription: EB 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via: Cermak, Cicero, 16th, Kostner and Cermak, due to, street blockage, near Cermak/Kenneth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via: Cermak, Cicero, 16th, Kostner and Cermak, due to, street blockage, near Cermak/Kenneth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
